DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ONO-1101 in patients scheduled for coronary angiography, in a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel group, multi-center study.
DOC.brief_title: Study of ONO-1101 in Patients Scheduled for Coronary Angiography
DOC.criteria: 20 years of age or older Heart rate less than 90 beats/min and more than 70 beats/min at entering the CT room Previous allergic reactions to contrast agent Renal failure Asthma Concomitant betareceptor blocking agent
